case_study.title: Launching a New Soft Drink
case_study.description: A beverage company wants to introduce a new energy drink and needs a marketing campaign.

performance_indicators: Develop a marketing strategy based on consumer trends.
Use digital advertising to target specific audiences.

case_study.title: Startup Financial Plan
case_study.description: A new tech startup needs a financial plan to attract investors.

performance_indicators: Evaluate financial statements to assess business health.
Create a budget plan for a startup business.
